name: Social Hater
description:
A mini game for those who are tired of their daily routine in social networks. Feel like a huge hammer and smash robots in the form of social networks

Playing in style  whack a mole 

"Whack a Mole" is a casual game, players can play with a relaxed mood.

How to play: The player clicks on the screen to play the hammer, and scores according to the number of robots hit.
